spec_data.Name: libglvnd-core-devel
spec_data.Description:
The libglvnd-core-devel package is a bootstrap trick for Mesa, which wants
to build against the libglvnd headers but does not link against any of
its libraries (and, initially, has file conflicts with them). If you are
not Mesa you almost certainly want libglvnd-devel instead.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 11 Nov 2017 03:26:24 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
